feeding_notification_message: Your reptiles {{reptiles}} need to be fed today.
feeding_email_text:
Hi {{userName}},

Today is feeding day for your reptiles: {{reptiles}}.

Remember to feed them and update their status from your dashboard!

Go to: {{frontendUrl}}/dashboard

You are receiving this email because you have enabled feeding notifications on SnakeBee.
You can disable them from your account settings.
feeding_email_html:
It's time to feed your reptiles! üêçüçΩÔ∏è

Hi {{userName}},

Today is feeding day for the following reptiles:

    {{#each reptiles}}
  • üê¢ {{name}} - {{morph}} - {{sex}}
    • {{/each}}

Remember to update the feeding status once completed!

Go to Dashboard

You are receiving this email because you have enabled feeding notifications on SnakeBee.
You can disable them anytime from your account settings.

notification.activeStripe_subscription: Your subscription to the {{subscription}} plan has been successfully activated.

day0.subject: Welcome to SnakeBee! üêù Ready to start off on the right foot?
day0.title: Welcome to the platform!
day0.body:
We are thrilled to have you with us. SnakeBee was born to take the stress out of management and leave you with just the joy of keeping.

The first step to bringing order to chaos is adding your first animal. Don't worry, it only takes 30 seconds!

day1.subject: Never run out of food again! üêÅ
day1.title: Manage feedings and inventory
day1.body:
Did you know that SnakeBee not only tracks meals but also manages your frozen stock?

Log your animals' meals and keep an eye on your supplies in the Food Inventory section. The system will automatically deduct feeders and notify you when you're running low.
day1.cta: Subscribe to SnakeBee and Log a Meal

day3.subject: How much is it growing? üìà
day3.title: Health starts with data
day3.body:
Seeing your animal grow is such a satisfaction.

By regularly entering weights, SnakeBee will generate detailed growth charts for you. It's the best way to monitor health status and spot immediately if something is wrong.

day5.subject: The power of QR Codes üì±
day5.title: Everything just a scan away
day5.body:
Imagine walking past the enclosure, scanning a code with your phone, and instantly seeing your animal's entire history.

With SnakeBee, you can generate and print custom QR Codes for every profile. Try it now, you'll feel like a true pro!

day7.subject: One week together! How's it going? üí¨
day7.title: Your opinion matters
day7.body:
It's been a week! We hope managing your collection has become simpler and more organized.

SnakeBee grows thanks to feedback from keepers like you. Spotted a bug or have a dream feature you'd like to see? Write to us!

day14.subject: Forgot something? üìÖ
day14.title: Plan like a Swiss watch
day14.body:
Cleaning, vet visits, water changes... keeping it all in mind is hard.

Use the SnakeBee Calendar to set recurring reminders. We'll send you a notification when it's time to act. Free your mind!

day30.subject: One month of SnakeBee! üéâ
day30.title: You are officially a SnakeBee Expert!
day30.body:
Wow, a month has already passed! Your collection has never been so organized.

In the meantime, have you checked out our Blog? You'll find articles on genetics, husbandry, and useful tips written by experts.

lowInventory.subject: üö® Food Alert - SnakeBee
lowInventory.title: Food Supply Low!
lowInventory.intro: Hi! Our system has calculated that some of your reptile food supplies are running low:
lowInventory.recommendationIntro: Based on your active reptiles, we recommend purchasing:
lowInventory.noRecommendations: No recommendations. Set preferred food and weight in your reptile profiles.
